text:
Perfect! The language badges have been successfully removed. The interface is now cleaner and simpler:

## âœ… Language Badges Removed Successfully

**Changes Made:**
- **Removed Badge import:** No longer importing the Badge component
- **Simplified language dropdowns:** Both source and target language selectors now show just the language names
- **Cleaner interface:** No more small region badges cluttering the dropdown options
- **Maintained functionality:** All language selection features work exactly the same

**Benefits:**
- **Cleaner design:** More minimal and focused user interface
- **Better readability:** Language names are easier to scan without visual noise
- **Faster selection:** Users can quickly identify languages without extra visual elements
- **Mobile-friendly:** Simpler dropdowns work better on smaller screens

The Linguala translator now has a much cleaner, more professional appearance that focuses user attention on the core translation functionality! ðŸŽ¯
